The Agentic State

This whitepaper aims to stimulate discussion on how agentic AI will revamp 10 functional layers of government and public administration, challenging assumptions and establishing a shared basis for experimentation. The authors aim to work openly with the wider GovTech community, expanding and refining the document in successive versions.

Key Concepts:

  • Agentic State
  • 10 Functional Layers
  • Revamping Government
  • Public-Private Partnerships
  • paradigm shift
  • digital modernisation
  • best practices for agentic AI adoption
Agentic AI Government Public Administration Whitepaper GovTech agentic AI government digital transformation technology adoption cost savings operational efficiency
